consistency_analysis.timeline_summary: Longstanding record supporting voting rights expansion and opposing voter suppression efforts, dating back to House tenure and continuing in the Senate.
consistency_analysis.response_to_key_events: Strongly condemned Jan 6th attack and the 'big lie'.

consistency_analysis.timeline_summary: Consistently aligned with efforts to challenge the 2020 election results, including signing onto the Texas lawsuit and voting against certification.
consistency_analysis.response_to_key_events: Actively supported challenges to the 2020 election outcome.

key_votes.vote_description: Vote on passage of Omnibus funding bill including Electoral Count Reform Act
key_votes.relevance_summary: Voted for the omnibus bill containing the Electoral Count Reform Act, aimed at preventing future attempts to overturn presidential election results.

key_votes.vote_description: Cloture vote on motion to proceed to John R. Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act
key_votes.relevance_summary: Voted against advancing the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act.

key_votes.vote_description: Cloture vote on motion to proceed to For the People Act
key_votes.relevance_summary: Voted against advancing the For the People Act.

key_votes.vote_description: Vote on conviction of Donald Trump for Incitement of Insurrection
key_votes.relevance_summary: Voted to acquit on the charge of inciting the Jan 6th insurrection.

key_votes.vote_description: Objection to counting the electoral votes of Pennsylvania
key_votes.relevance_summary: Voted against objecting to Pennsylvania's electoral votes.

key_votes.vote_description: Objection to counting the electoral votes of Arizona
key_votes.relevance_summary: Voted against objecting to Arizona's electoral votes.

consistency_analysis.timeline_summary: Voted to certify the 2020 election results. Voted to acquit in the second impeachment trial related to the Jan 6th insurrection.
consistency_analysis.response_to_key_events: Did not object to 2020 election certification. Voted against conviction after Jan 6th.
